title: NR.5-Typographic Process, Typographis als < Malerei> [Typography as <Painting>], from the School of Design, Basel
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description:
At upper left center in large black block leters, NR.5. Below, poster design incorporates the letters TEE [Trans Europe Express] in various tonal gradation formed by the linear division of the typographic fonts. At left the cover of the book is presented with a suggestion of mountains constructed with thin lines and the sun represented as a simple black dot (typography as landscape) and at upper right center Zurich is shown with short diagonal llines suggesting rain. The other stops of the railway line from Switzerland to Milan are, at lower left, Lugano; at lower right Como. 
At upper left a text block describing the projects described above and at upper left the educational agenda from the School of Design, Basel that was the basis for the poster series.
name: Poster
